title: Evonne Goolagong Cawley crowns Ash Barty Australian Open champion
material_description: Digital screen recording of @AusOpen Twitter post
brief_description: Ngarigo woman and world number one in women’s singles tennis, Ash Barty, accepts the Daphne Akhurst Memorial Cup after a two-set victory in her Australian Open finals match against Danielle Collins. The trophy was bestowed on her by former world number one, Wiradjuri tennis legend Evonne Goolagong Cawley, who was crowned women’s singles champion at the Australian Open four years running, from 1974-77.
title_for_label: Evonne Goolagong Cawley crowns champion Ash Barty at the Australian Open
description: Ngarigo woman and women’s tennis world number one Ash Barty accepts the Daphne Akhurst Memorial Cup after a two-set victory in the Australian Open final against Danielle Collins. The trophy was bestowed on her by former world number one, Wiradjuri tennis legend Evonne Goolagong Cawley, who was crowned women’s singles champion at the Australian Open four years running, from 1974-77.
